modName: Shout the language of the Dragons
summary: Replaces the vanilla shouts with dragon shouts (Paarthunax). Watch video.
descriptionHtml:
==
DESCRIPTION
==
For those looking for a new way to shout at your foes, replace your old shouts with this!

ONLY for MALES!
Replaces the vanilla shouts with dragon shouts (Paarthunax).

==
Other shout:
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4700


==

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pMz_JCr3oEc


==
==
Installation in Folder
==
author: TheFPSmachine
